entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending before morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
